title: Yasuo dash bug

embed.description: Watch Paero's League of Legends video: How did I dash to Zed? - Plays.tv

body:
Pretty much what happened was, I dashed to the Xin, went right through him into the Zed that I had no vision of, and didn't even attempt to go towards him

Sorry, the video cuts off a few seconds earlier than it should have, but you can still see the dash

replies.body: Not sure what you mean? From what I'm seeing, you dash through xin, press q to do the knockup (presumably meant for xin), and then it cuts out
because i was targeting xin, yet i was able to dash straight to the zed even though I couldn't see him

> [{quoted}](name=Paero,realm=OCE,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=gtvYQ0Hi,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-12-16T04:35:48.836+0000)
>
> because i was targeting xin, yet i was able to dash straight to the zed even though I couldn't see him

mate you can clearly see that xin does have the dash indicator marker that tells you when you can dash to him again, while zed does not, which means that you did not dash to zed, just through the wall into zed. your own clip proves that it is not a bug.

so I infact dashed through xin and over a wall straight onto zed, so even if zed wasnt there, I still would have dashed over the wall (I didn't know you could do that)

I play yas once in a blue moon, never seen this happen, therefore it looked like a bug to me

better to report it and be proven wrong than to not report it even though it be
And yeah it's not a bug. It's intended. Your dash will ALWAYS go full distance. Since the edge of the range circle was closer to the other side of the wall, you went through it.
makes sense, zed just happened to be directly in the line making it appear I dashed straight to him when I didnt
Not a bug. You dashed through xin over the wall. Just bad luck zed happened to be there.
if that was the case, why did my attack animation start that quickly?

> [{quoted}](name=Paero,realm=OCE,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=gtvYQ0Hi,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-12-16T03:53:47.623+0000)
>
> if that was the case, why did my attack animation start that quickly?

When you cast Q after your E, it's queued while you're in the middle of the E animation. So no matter where you end up, you'll always spin.
Why is it not on YouTube
its straight from my playstv account
